sentences.en: Columbus kept a careful and detailed chronicle of his voyages.

sentences.en: Every mouldering stone was a chronicle.

sentences.en: His life is chronicled in a new biography published last week.

sentences.en: I disdain to chronicle such victories.

sentences.en: The book chronicles the events leading up to the war.

sentences.en: There is a musty chronicle, written in tolerable Latin.

sentences.en: There's time enough left to you to fill whole chronicle chronicles.
